content: this pillowghan is made up of 10 separate squares 9 squares are seamed together to form the blanket portion while the 10th square is sewn on to form the pillow pocket the blanket folds up and fits inside the pocket to form a pillow a two in one project don t worry about starting at the same spot in each color sequence of parfait® chunky fruits we think it s more fun when there s variation in the patterning finished measurements afghan 48 x 48 pillow 16 x 16 materials premier® yarns parfait® chunky fruits 100% polyester 7oz/200g 262yds/240m 2143-05 kiwi - 7 balls hooks & notions us size l-11 8 mm or size needed to obtain gauge tapestry needle smooth worsted or bulky yarn for seaming in a neutral color or color to match yarn
